CTR.Q: What type of chart is this?

VEC.Q: How many stages are there in this funnel chart?

SRP.Q: Is the Join Group or Community stage positioned above or below the Participate in Paid Subscription stage?
SRP.A: The Join Group or Community stage is positioned {above} the Participate in Paid Subscription stage.

VPR.Q: What pattern does the data reduction follow in this funnel chart?
VPR.A: The data reduction follows a {exponential} pattern.

VE.Q: What is the value of stage Content Creation or Upload?
VE.A: The value of stage Content Creation or Upload is {73}.

VE.Q: What is the value of stage Join Group or Community?
VE.A: The value of stage Join Group or Community is {132}.

VE.Q: What is the value of stage Share Content?
VE.A: The value of stage Share Content is {427}.

EVJ.Q: What is the maximum value in the funnel chart?
EVJ.A: The stage with the highest value is Share Content, with a value of {427}.

EVJ.Q: What is the minimum value in the funnel chart?
EVJ.A: The stage with the lowest value is Participate in Paid Subscription, with a value of {61}.

SC.Q: How much did it decrease from stage Follow Account to stage Join Group or Community?
SC.A: Decreased by {116} Million Users from stage Follow Account to stage Join Group or Community.

SC.Q: How much did it decrease from stage Share Content to stage Follow Account?
SC.A: Decreased by {179} Million Users from stage Share Content to stage Follow Account.

NF.Q: In which stages of the funnel chart does the value exceed 102? Please list the stage labels and corresponding values.
NF.A: The {Share Content} stage has {427}, the {Follow Account} stage has {248}, the {Join Group or Community} stage has {132}.

NF.Q: In which stages of the funnel chart does the value fall below 190? Please list the stage labels and corresponding values.
NF.A: The {Join Group or Community} stage has {132}, the {Content Creation or Upload} stage has {73}, the {Participate in Paid Subscription} stage has {61}.

NF.Q: In which stages of the funnel chart does the value fall between 67 and 190? Please list the stage labels and corresponding values.
NF.A: The {Join Group or Community} stage has {132}, the {Content Creation or Upload} stage has {73}.

NC.Q: Which reduction is greater: from stage Share Content to Follow Account, or from stage Content Creation or Upload to Participate in Paid Subscription?
NC.A: The reduction from stage {Share Content} to {Follow Account} is greater.

NC.Q: Which reduction is the greatest: from stage Join Group or Community to Content Creation or Upload, from stage Share Content to Follow Account, or from stage Content Creation or Upload to Participate in Paid Subscription?
NC.A: The reduction from stage {Share Content} to stage {Follow Account} is the greatest.

MSR.Q: Between which two consecutive stages in the funnel chart is the conversion rate drop the largest?
MSR.A: The largest drop in conversion rate occurs between the {Share Content} and {Follow Account} stages.

MSR.Q: Between which two consecutive stages in the funnel chart is the conversion rate drop the smallest?
MSR.A: The smallest drop in conversion rate occurs between the {Content Creation or Upload} and {Participate in Paid Subscription} stages.
